channel.title: Jagex like RSC
channel.description:
Elite-Gaming is now hosting a RSC server, although our best server is our World of Warcraft Server. We are running a RSC server that is identical to the Jagex servers just higher exp rates. Our site is elitegaming.game-host.org. Join if you want.
Flame away.

item.title: Jagex like RSC
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

[quote=“Anc13nts253, post:5, topic:277528”]EDIT: Nevermind your using a Rscd base but your using the Leftys server NO forums one.

Just letting you know I wouldn’t use that on your dedi, it creates something when you run it that can allow someone as in me to access it. hahahaha.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 05, 2009, 11:11:01 pm[/size][hr][quote author=Johnisriot link=topic=366404.msg2777396#msg2777396 date=1241586491]

[/quote]
I know 95% of the bugs.[/quote]If you don’t know all the bugs how do you know what to %?

item.title: Jagex like RSC
item.dc:creator: @Jessekinss Jessekinss
item.description:
@Jessekinss wrote:

[quote=“Veybi, post:37, topic:277528”][quote author=Jessekinss link=topic=366404.msg2779434#msg2779434 date=1241697778]

lol, okay guys Ill stop messing with these 2 servers. I am just bored and have nothing else to do right now. Because someone named ‘tewl’ likes taking down everyone’s servers.

But yeah Im actually a really nice person. I was just trying to have a little fun with some fail sources hahah.

So what that they are fail sources? Failure bites its own hand, they don’t need you to tell them anything. I’ve been reading forums for 2 days now and every single post you have (except for this one) you are trying to sound cool by showing off your obsolete and useless skill of fucking with people’s RS servers. Let me tell you something - it’s not funny, and it’s not cool.

If they can’t secure a server they have no business hosting one.
[/quote]

And who are you to make up that rule? If you can’t play basketball then you have no business in it? If a server is a failure let it run and it will eventually die - nobody needs a big brother to control the RSC community in idiotic ways.[/quote]

Yeah that’s exactly what I’m saying. Don’t get into something you know nothing about. Most of these kids are just trying to make a name for themselves, not for the development of RSC servers. They bring up a server with no java edits and no idea how to code java and/or secure a server.
That rule should be pretty standard.

Even if that server fails (I don’t know why I said IF. It will), they will always be able to say “yeah so I ran this server called blah blah, I’m somebody now!!1”. That shit is so old.

Read full topic

lol, okay guys Ill stop messing with these 2 servers. I am just bored and have nothing else to do right now. Because someone named ‘tewl’ likes taking down everyone’s servers.

But yeah Im actually a really nice person. I was just trying to have a little fun with some fail sources hahah.

So what that they are fail sources? Failure bites its own hand, they don’t need you to tell them anything. I’ve been reading forums for 2 days now and every single post you have (except for this one) you are trying to sound cool by showing off your obsolete and useless skill of fucking with people’s RS servers. Let me tell you something - it’s not funny, and it’s not cool.

If they can’t secure a server they have no business hosting one.

yo lol man, tats so funny comin from u… ur servers db was like droped 1 hr after u relesed the servr!

also, u got like so much down time… ur sever suks cock.

edit : o, and anc13nts, u r a gay homosexul faget! stop haxing with severs… ur servr is gay and is allways ofline

How am I suppose to take you seriously when you spell like an 8 year old?
That’s true, my database did get dropped, however do you see anything else happening of that sort? No.
You’re entitled to your option, but keep it mind your opinion really doesn’t matter.
[/quote]

lmao u made a few erors in ur speelling to!! fuking fail? yeah i tink SO

rscpk sucks, isnt wel made, and is allways down? yes, it is GAy[/quote]

I never said I was perfect kid.
Always? No. As I said you can state your opinions, but frankly I couldn’t care less of what you have to say.
